text: *Important note: A bug was identified impacting EMAILS and ENGAGEMENT subscriptions after this recent release of the generic webhook subscriptions public beta. Our engineering team is working dutifully to resolve this issue ASAP. This note will be removed once the bug has been remedied.*

Would love to know if there is something in the product roadmap for the podcast side of Content Hub where its easy to migrate existing podcasts in. Seems like its really only feasible for brand new podcasts currently.

<@U7AU6414J> this is great feedback. What would be the basic functionality you’d expect from a tool to migrate to podcasts into HubSpot?

Secondly, what would make you go “Wow” during that process, making your experience easy?
